narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Connect Home Health LLC is a Home Health provider based in North Richland Hills, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $92.5M in Medicaid payments across 213K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $92.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
